Module comp3111.examsystem
Package comp3111.examsystem

Class Teacher

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.Account
comp3111.examsystem.User
comp3111.examsystem.Teacher
public class Teacher extends User
A class representing a teacher, which extends the User class.

    • Teacher

      public Teacher(String username, String password, String name, String gender, int age, String department, String position)
      Constructs a new Teacher account with the provided details.
      Parameters:
      username - The new username to set.
      password - The new password to set.
      name - The new name to set.
      gender - The new gender to set.
      age - The new age to set.
      department - The new department to set.
      position - The new position to set.

      public Teacher update(String username, String password, String name, String gender, int age, String department, String position)

      Parameters:
      username - The new username to set.
      password - The new password to set.
      name - The new name to set.
      gender - The new gender to set.
      age - The new age to set.
      department - The new department to set.
      position - The new position to set.
      Returns:
      This Teacher instance after updating the details.

      public List<String> getCourseID()
      Returns a list of course IDs taught by the teacher.

      A list of course IDs.

    • createExam

      public void createExam(String examName, String courseID, boolean isPublished, int duration, ArrayList<Question> questions)
      Creates a new exam for a specified course.
      Parameters:
      examName - The name of the exam.
      courseID - The ID of the course for which the exam is created.
      isPublished - Indicates whether the exam is published.
      duration - The duration of the exam in minutes.
      questions - A list of questions for the exam.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the teacher does not have permission to manage the specified course or if there is no such course.

    • addExam

      public void addExam(Exam exam, String courseID)
      Adds an existing exam to a specified course.
      Parameters:
      exam - The exam object to be added.
      courseID - The ID of the course to which the exam should be added.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the teacher does not have permission to manage the specified course or if there is no such course.

    • deleteExam

      public void deleteExam(String examName, String courseID)
      Deletes an exam from a specified course.
      Parameters:
      examName - The name of the exam to be deleted.
      courseID - The ID of the course from which the exam should be deleted.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the teacher does not have permission to manage the specified course or if there is no such course.

    • deleteExam

      public void deleteExam(Exam exam, Course course)
      Deletes an exam from a specified course.
      Parameters:
      exam - The exam object to be deleted.
      course - The course object from which the exam should be deleted.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the teacher does not have permission to manage the specified course or if there is no such course.

    • updateExam

      public void updateExam(String oldExamName, Course oldCourse, String examName, String courseID, boolean isPublished, int duration, ArrayList<Question> questions)
      Updates an existing exam with new details.
      Parameters:
      oldExamName - The original name of the exam to be updated.
      oldCourse - The original course associated with the exam.
      examName - The new name for the exam.
      courseID - The ID of the new course for the exam.
      isPublished - Indicates whether the updated exam should be published.
      duration - The new duration of the exam in minutes.
      questions - A list of new questions for the exam.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If there is no such course or if the teacher does not have permission to manage the specified course.

    • updateExam

      public void updateExam(String oldExamName, Course oldCourse, String examName, Course course, boolean isPublished, int duration, ArrayList<Question> questions)
      Updates an existing exam with new details.
      Parameters:
      oldExamName - The original name of the exam to be updated.
      oldCourse - The original course associated with the exam.
      examName - The new name for the exam.
      course - The new course for the exam.
      isPublished - Indicates whether the updated exam should be published.
      duration - The new duration of the exam in minutes.
      questions - A list of new questions for the exam.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If there is no such course or if the teacher does not have permission to manage the specified course.

    • viewQuestion

      public void viewQuestion()
      Displays all questions in the teacher's question bank.

    • createQuestion

      public void createQuestion(String content, String[] options, String answer, int score, int type)
      Creates a new question and adds it to the teacher's question bank.
      Parameters:
      content - The content of the question.
      options - An array of strings representing the answer choices.
      answer - The correct answer to the question.
      score - The score assigned to this question.
      type - The type of the question (e.g., multiple-choice, true/false).
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If a question with the same content and options already exists in the question bank.

    • createQuestion

      public void createQuestion(Question question)
      Creates a new question and adds it to the teacher's question bank.
      Parameters:
      question - The Question object to be added.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If a question with the same content and options already exists in the question bank.

    • deleteQuestion

      public void deleteQuestion(Question question)
      Deletes a specified question from the teacher's question bank and removes it from all associated exams.
      Parameters:
      question - The Question object to be deleted.

    • updateQuestion

      public void updateQuestion(Question question, String content, String[] options, String answer, int score, int type)
      Updates the details of an existing question in the teacher's question bank.
      Parameters:
      question - The Question object to be updated.
      content - The new content for the question.
      options - An array of strings representing the new answer choices.
      answer - The new correct answer to the question.
      score - The new score assigned to this question.
      type - The new type of the question as integer (0 - Single, 1 - Multiple).

    • updateQuestion

      public void updateQuestion(Question question, String content, String[] options, String answer, int score, String type)
      Updates the details of an existing question in the teacher's question bank.
      Parameters:
      question - The Question object to be updated.
      content - The new content for the question.
      options - An array of strings representing the new answer choices.
      answer - The new correct answer to the question.
      score - The new score assigned to this question.
      type - The new type of the question ("Multiple", "Single").
